title: Turn your TV into an art gallery with $17 off Dreamscreens
description:
When your TV isn’t on, it’s sort of an ugly piece of decor. You can change that with Dreamscreens, the clever USB plug-in that turns your TV into a digital art gallery when it’s not in use.

DreamScreens contains more than 500 of the most iconic paintings in history in a slideshow that you can activate by simply plugging into your TV.
